pages.title: Cooking jams
pages.text: Jams can be made from: blackberry, blueberry, cherry, gooseberry, marula, num-num, mulberry, raspberry, strawberry.You will need to combine several berries or fruits to get the handful of them.Then handfuls of fruits are used to prepare a saucepan of raw jam.Cook it in the furnace to get ready jam and richt-click on the glass jar to get the jam jar.
You can then eat jam directly from the jar with right-click.If you use a ladle on the jam jar, you will get ladle with jam.Ladle with jam is used to cook parcels with jam.
